Samuro.name: Mirror Image
Samuro.description: Create 2 Mirror Images that deal 25% of your damage and have 50% of your current Health. Images last up to 18 seconds, and only two can be active at any one time.

Samuro.name: Critical Strike
Samuro.description: Your next Basic Attack within 10 seconds will be a Critical Strike, dealing 50% increased damage. This also applies to Images, and does not break Wind Walk. Passive: You and your Images deal a Critical Strike on every 4th Basic Attack.

Samuro.name: Wind Walk
Samuro.description: Enter Stealth for up to 10 seconds or until you attack, use an Ability, or take damage. While Stealthed, your Movement Speed is increased by 25% and you can pass through other units. Damage taken within the first 1 second will not break Wind Walk.

Samuro.name: Bladestorm
Samuro.description: Become an Unstoppable whirlwind of death, dealing 235 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

Samuro.name: Illusion Master
Samuro.description: Switch places with the target Mirror Image. Passive: You can control Mirror Images separately or as a group, and they deal an additional 10% of your damage.

Samuro.name: Advancing Strikes
Samuro.description: Basic attacks against enemy Heroes increase your movement speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

1.name: Way of Illusion
1.description: Quest: Every time one of your Images Critically Strikes a Hero, gain 0.5 Attack Damage, up to 20. Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, gain an additional 20 Attack Damage.

1.name: Way of the Blade
1.description: Critical Strike now happens every 3rd Basic Attack and deals an additional 20% of your Basic Attack damage.

1.name: Way of the Wind
1.description: Quest: Attacking a Hero from Stealth increases the Movement Speed bonus of Wind Walk by 1.25%, up to 25%. Reward: After attacking 20 Heroes, Wind Walk's Unrevealable duration is increased to 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Deflection
4.description: Advancing Strikes grants 25 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks, reducing their damage by 25%.

4.name: Mirage
4.description: Mirror Image grants Samuro and his Images 40 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell damage, reducing their damage by 40%.

4.name: One with the Wind
4.description: While Stealthed by Wind Walk, you take 60% reduced damage from all sources.

7.name: Burning Blade
7.description: Critical Strikes unleash a burst of flame, dealing an additional 65% of your Basic Attack damage to the target and nearby enemies.

7.name: Crushing Blows
7.description: Critical Strike now has two charges, and Critical Strikes deal an additional 25% of your Basic Attack damage.

7.name: Phantom Pain
7.description: Critical Strikes deal an additional 40% of your Basic Attack damage for each Image you have active.

10.name: Bladestorm
10.description: Become an Unstoppable whirlwind of death, dealing 235 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

10.name: Illusion Master
10.description: Switch places with the target Mirror Image, removing most negative effects from Samuro and the target Mirror Image. Passive: You can control Mirror Images separately or as a group, and they deal an additional 10% of your damage.

13.name: Kawarimi
13.description: Wind Walk creates an Image at your location that will continue whatever you were doing.

13.name: Mirrored Steel
13.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Mirror Image by 1 second.

13.name: Shukuchi
13.description: Wind Walk teleports you a short distance in the direction you're currently facing.

16.name: Harsh Winds
16.description: Attacking a Hero from Stealth causes them to take 30% increased damage from Samuro and his Images for 3 seconds.

16.name: Merciless Strikes
16.description: Basic Attacks against slowed, rooted, or stunned targets are always Critical Strikes.

16.name: Press the Attack
16.description: While Advancing Strikes is active, Basic Attacks increase your Attack Speed by 15%, up to 60%.

20.name: Blademaster's Pursuit
20.description: Advancing Strikes grants an additional 15% bonus Movement Speed, and its duration is increased by 2 seconds.

20.name: Dance of Death
20.description: Your Images use Bladestorm when you do.

20.name: Three Blade Style
20.description: Your Images gain an additional 50% of your Health and last up to 36 seconds.

20.name: Wind Strider
20.description: Wind Walk's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.
